name: Thunderwave
description: A wave of thunderous force sweeps out from you. Each creature within range must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 2d8 thunder damage and is pushed 10 feet away from you. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't pushed.
notes: Pushes enemies away on failed save

material_component.focus_provided: Totem provides unlimited bone-dust, Yew Wand provides unlimited tree-sap, OR Wand provides unlimited arcane-powder, Crystal provides unlimited quartz-dust (for wizards)
